name: Bionic Reading
description: Bionic Reading® is a new method facilitating the reading process by guiding the eyes through text with artificial fixation points. As a result, the reader is only focusing on the highlighted initial letters and lets the brain center complete the word. FREE (Rapid Basic): $0.00, 500 requests/day, Hard Limit — BASIC (Rapid Pro): $19.00, 20000 requests/day, Hard Limit — EXTENDED: Bionic Reading® API Licensing or Bionic Reading® IP Licensing → For individual Licensing contact us via “Contact Sale...

api_methods.name: Convert
api_methods.description: Convert plain text to Bionic Reading.

parameters.name: saccade
parameters.description:
With the Saccade you define the visual jumps from Fixation to Fixation.
You can choose a value between 10 and 50, in steps of ten (10,20,30, 40 or 50);

parameters.name: response_type
parameters.description: You can choose between "html" and "page". "html" returns HTML code to embed, while "page" returns HTML code ready to embed in your application or webpage as iframe.

parameters.name: fixation
parameters.description:
With the Fixation you define the expression of the letter combinations.
You can choose a value between 1 and 5 (1,2,3, 4 or 5);

parameters.name: content
parameters.description: The URL to a not password protected page or a plain text or html string
parameters.default: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consetetur sadipscing elitr, sed diam nonumy eirmod tempor invidunt ut labore et dolore magna aliquyam erat, sed diam voluptua. utterances.utterance: Can you convert the text from 'https://example.com/article' into Bionic Reading format with a saccade of 20 and fixation level 3?
I need the Bionic Reading version of 'https://example.com/blog' with a saccade of 30 and fixation set to 2, and please return it as a page.
Transform the text from 'https://example.com/story' using Bionic Reading with a saccade of 40 and a fixation of 4.
Please convert the content from 'https://example.com/news' to Bionic Reading format with a saccade of 50 and fixation level 5, and return it as a page.
I'd like the Bionic Reading version of 'https://example.com/poem' with a saccade of 10 and fixation set to 1.
Convert 'https://example.com/essay' into Bionic Reading format with a saccade of 20 and fixation level 2, and return it as a page.
Can you transform the text from 'https://example.com/novel' using Bionic Reading with a saccade of 30 and a fixation of 3?
I need the Bionic Reading version of 'https://example.com/report' with a saccade of 40 and fixation set to 4, and please return it as a page.
Please convert the content from 'https://example.com/review' to Bionic Reading format with a saccade of 50 and fixation level 5.
I'd like the Bionic Reading version of 'https://example.com/guide' with a saccade of 10 and fixation set to 1, and return it as a page.
